participant_abstract.sent: This meeting was to define the definite component aspect and component of the remote control based on the point of view of the UID, ID and ME

participant_actions.sent: ID: show a first release version of the remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: The decisions were: -the remote control energy alimentation will be solar energy based with low level chips and wooden made. the user graphical interface will be "google and fancy" based according to what sait M. Jordan the UID with lcd button and some voal commands.

participant_problems.sent: Serious argumentations about the need of vocal and gesture commands due to their lack of reliability and the difficulty to make them universal.
